lead_paragraph: Ivan Provorov admitted he was motivated to make his second career game against the Chicago Blackhawks a lot better than his first.

headline.print_headline: Provorov Scores 2, Prevents 1 as Flyers Beat Blackhawks 3-1
headline.main: Provorov Scores 2, Prevents 1 as Flyers Beat Blackhawks 3-1
